name: Labb
description:
A lone hero starts a long dangerous way to a misterious temple. What for?  Maybe they seek a treasure. May be they seek a lost relative. May be they seek some great secret. The adventure begins here and who knows where it will end?

Welcome to the Labb, a roguelike game!

Game modes

Tactical. If the player does nothing and no key is pressed, the game time is frozen. You may safely think out your next action.

Realtime. As in usual action RPG you don't have time to think, you hit and run, and your enemies do the same.

Controls

In game:
Movement and rotation - left mouse button (hold to proceed); W, A, S, D; arrows
Action - right mouse button (the hero is firstly rotated), Space
Select a slot in action panel - mouse button; 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 0, Tab
Remove action from slot - R
Inventory - I, C
Menu - P, Escape
To wait (in tactical mode) - press any other key (e.g. T or F2).

In inventory:
Select a skill/item - mouse button; W, A, S, D; arrows
Put a skill/item to a slot in action panel - 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 0
Remove a skill/item from its slot in action panel - R
Equip or unequip item - EThere are 3 equipment slots - cloth, artifact and ring.

In menu:Change selection - mouse button; W, A, S, D; arrowsConfirm - Space, Enter
Cancel - Escape

Global:
Toggle fullscreen - Alt + Enter, Ctrl + F

There is also in-game information on the controls (Settings -> Show controls).
